column1: THUS is a Primitive Quendian Sundocarme signifying "evil mist

column2: the root THUS (given no signification) yields the Primitive Quendian form thausā
column3: from which derives Quenya (Qenya) saura. From this root also derives Noldorin thaw "corrupt
column5: and thû "stench" (used as a proper name
